document.heading: Electric Company Infrastructure Improvement Financing Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-102, the “Electric Company Infrastructure Improvement Financing Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-387. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 7, 2014, and February 4, 2014, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 3, 2014 it was assigned Act No. 20-290 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-102 became effective on May 3, 2014.
